    type: table
    sort: sortby
    fields: [title, subtitle, started, ended]
    sort-ui: [title, subtitle, started, ended]
    filter-ui: [title, subtitle, started, ended]
    field-display-names: 
      title: "Name"
      subtitle: "Role"
      started: "Started"
      ended: "Ended"
